biocontainers.name: msprime
biocontainers.license: GNU Lesser General Public License v3 or later (LGPLv3+)
biocontainers.summary: A fast and accurate coalescent simulator.

biotools.summary: Msprime is a Python package that simulates ancestral histories and DNA sequence data. Msprime uses backwards-in-time "coalescent" models which allows it to simulate data very efficiently; however, it is not as flexible as forwards-in-time simulators (e.g. SLiM, fwdpy11).

bioschemas.name: msprime
bioschemas.summary: Msprime is a Python package that simulates ancestral histories and DNA sequence data. Msprime uses backwards-in-time "coalescent" models which allows it to simulate data very efficiently; however, it is not as flexible as forwards-in-time simulators (e.g. SLiM, fwdpy11).
